Description:
Position Title: International Sales ManagerEmployment Type: Full Time Salary: up to 30K AED, depending on experience and qualifications plus transportation and annual performance-related bonusJob Location: Dubai, UAEAbout the Client: A well-established company in the consumer goods industry providing service to an international reachJob Description: Develop and maintain strong client relationships by visiting international markets and addressing their needs and inquiries.
Coordinate and oversee order processing, ensuring efficient and timely fulfillment and delivery.
Represent the company at international trade shows and exhibitions to generate leads and expand business opportunities.
Conduct market research to identify new prospects and analyze market trends and competitor activities.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, set sales targets, prepare reports, and ensure compliance with trade regulationsSkills
Skills:
25 to 35 years old 
At least 5 years of experience in FMCG sales, travel retail and duty-free
Liquor background is a must
Willing to travel frequently around the world to visit clients
Proficiency in French, Spanish, Hindi, Mandarin or Arabic is an advantage
Immediate joiners will be prioritized
